Title: Liza LF M 561 by Wig Pro
Body (HTML): The Wig Pro Collection is designed to meet demands of wig professionals-customers who seek the finest products available while maintaining excellent values. Years of research and experience have contributed to the excellence in materials, constructions, appearance and comfort that are staples of the Wig Pro Collection. As the world leader in Optimum Cuticle Hair Wigs, Hair Extensions, and Hairpieces, Wig Pro delivers unparalleled quality in a distinctive selection of styles. Our hand-tied monofilament cap, or Mono-top, offers the most natural-looking and versatile appearance on the critical crown area. For those seeking the ultimate in comfort, our fully hand-tied models deliver unsurpassed luxury. A generous selection of NEXART hairpieces and extensions completes our palette of options to create natural, undetectable looks. Our stands of quality produce lightweight, comfortable wigs with unsurpassed color consistency. We use the finest combination of materials and construction to make our wigs a pleasure to see and feel.

Title: Johnny B MODE Styling Gel Medium Hold 64 oz
Body (HTML): Product Information : Look good and feel great all day long with that stunning hair style using the Johnny B Mode styling gel. As per the makers, this Johnny B styling gel help you style your hair more easily giving it a better control. Using this Johnny B hair gel lets you handle and style unmanageable hair. The alcohol-free formula of this Johnny B styling gel offers a great hold and does not flake or build up after a certain period of time. Although this Johnny B hair gel is thick, it can be rinsed off easily, for added convenience. So, get that shape you want for your hair and show off your sense of fashion and style with the Johnny B Mode gel.

Title: MISS JESSIES Rapid Recovery Treatment 2oz
Body (HTML):
Miss Jessie's RAPID RECOVERY TREATMENT
2 fl oz / 60ml

"THE BEST DARN CURL CREMES PERIOD."
NO FUSS AND FRIZZ-FREE

THE ESSENTIAL DEEP TREATMENT FOR REPAIRING DRY, BRITTLE CURLS

Made in the USA / No Animal testing has been done for this product



Product description

This once weekly intense luxurious deep treatment is the essential weapon for ensuring that your curls regain their healthy shiny bounce week to week. Rich Shea butter and avocado cream oil penetrate for a radiant sheen that reinforces a smooth tangle free curl. Quite simply, your curls just behave better with a weekly dose of Rapid Recovery Treatment. Instructions for use: Once weekly scoop out a golf ball sized dollop in your hand. Smooth onto damp curls section by section from the root downward. Run a wide tooth comb through your hair to detangle. Leave in for at least 10 minutes, and then rinse out. Proceed to styling with your favorite Miss Jessie's curl creme for natural hair. Great for: Restoring moisture and supple elasticity to dry, brittle curls, kinks, waves and naturals. This essential, intense deep treatment is a natural curl's secret weapon.

.

Title: Lord & Cliff Link & Lock- 100% Human Remy Hair - Fusion 20inch
Body (HTML):
Innovative Hair Extensions

Fast & Easy Way to apply Link & Lock Hair Extensions

Innovative Hair Extensions
Link & Lock - 100% Human Hair (Remi quality)
50 piece per package



Link & Lock VS Other Fusion Brands

1. Use the Lord & Cliff Wired looped Brush rather than a regular comb or brush and avoid pulling out your new extensions.
2. Regular shampoo and conditioner can be used to wash your hair with Link and Lock and you do NOT need anything specially formulated.

3. Using tools to style your hair
Hair Dryer - use cool or warm settings only. Avoid extreme heat on curly textures such as Body Pony Wave, Loose Deep Wave, and Fusion 3000 textures.
Flat Iron - Use them and other heated styling equipment under the bonded sheel area of your extension.
Other styling products can be used to style fusion hair. Use extreme caution with styling products and avoid heats that reach 400 degress or more because it can damage your extensions and natural hair.

4. Chemical relaxers and coloring can be used as long as it is done below the bonded shell area.

Title: Black Silk 100% Virgin Peruvian Hair-Natural Straight
Body (HTML):
Black Silk 100% VirginMalaysian Hair isUNPROCESSED, FULL-CUTICLE 100% HUMAN HAIRand comes from ONE DONER. This results in hair that is HOMOGENEOUS in color and moves and bounces NATURALLY. All cuticles are in the same direction to prevent tangling and matting. It'sCLASSY, MANAGEABLE AND SOFT TO THE TOUCH.It has a healthy shine and a naturally silky texture with soft waves creating fullness and volume.It is easy to maintain - JUST WASH AND GO.This Indian Hair isVERSATILE. Treat it like your own -BLOW DRY IT, USE A FLAT IRON, APPLY HEAT TO IT, PERM IT OR COLOR IT.It is REUSABLE UP TO 1 YEAR OR MORE!!!

ITEM SPECIFICATIONS

  • Item Type:Hair Extension (Hair Weave, Weaving)
  • Hair Place of Origin:Peruvian

  • Net Weight:Appr. 4 oz./Bundle/Pack

  • Weft Length:90~200 (Depends on the hair length)

Title: WOW  Braided Band
Body (HTML):
Color Shown (bottom left):234/23C
Type:Synthetic Hairpiece
Collection:WOW by LuxHair
Approx. Length:Width 1.6-1.8mm Braid Length 14.25" Band Length 4"
Product Weight:1.40 ounces

DESCRIPTION

Braided Band by WOW is a fast, simple, and stylish hair accessory. Braided Band adds a little boho feel to any hairstyle. Made with heat friendly synthetic fiber it looks, and feels like real hair. It holds your hair back, and adds a dimension of fashion at the same time. The Braided Band proves that headbands don't have to be boring.

Special Features:
Heat Friendly Synthetic fiber- looks and feels like real hair, stands up to heat and humidity.

Expert Tips:
To extend the life of your synthetic hair we recommend using BeautiMark care and styling products. BeautiMark is specially formulated for synthetic wigs and extensions.

Title: WOW  TOUSLED TWIST ADD-ON & EXTENSIONS
Body (HTML):
Color Shown (bottom left):24/18T
Type:Heat Friendly Synthetic Hairwrap
Collection:WOW by LuxHair
Approx. Length:Front 6"
Product Weight:1.50 ounces

DESCRIPTION

Tousled Twist by WOW adds flair to any style. Wrap Tousled Twist around a pony or bun as a fast and easy hair accessory. The heat friendly synthetic fiber stands up to heat and humidity and looks, moves, and feels like real hair. For a hairstyle in a hurry toss the scrunchy for a Tousled Twist. * Color choices that begin with "RD" indicate a rooted color. Rooted colors are designed to be darker at the root for the appearance of natural new growth.

Special Features:
Heat Friendly Synthetic fiber- looks, moves, and feels like real hair. Offers styling options.

Expert Tips:
To extend the life of your synthetic hair we recommend using BeautiMark care and styling products. BeautiMark is specially formulated for synthetic wigs and extensions
If your hair is long enough to gather into a ponytail, it's long enough to wear Tousled Twist.

Title: WOW  22 PONY FALL ADD-ON & EXTENSIONS
Body (HTML):
Color Shown (bottom left):12R
Type:Heat-Friendly Synthetic Fall
Collection:WOW by LuxHair
Approx. Length:Base 5.5" Overall 22"
Product Weight:3.00 ounces

DESCRIPTION

22" Pony/ Fall Extension by WOW creates an instant hair style in a snap. The versatile Pony Fall Extension can be worn as a ponytail or wear it as a fall for volumous hair! You can also wear it as a clip-in extension to add great body to your hair. This convertible hairpiece is so easy to use and attaches quickly. The pony/ fall goes in easily with pressure sensitive clips and a drawstring, for a secure fit. The heat friendly synthetic hair has beautiful soft waves, feels silky soft, and looks and moves like natural hair.

Special Features:
Heat Friendly Synthetic Fiber- Stands up to heat and humidity and offers select styling options
Pressure sensitive clips- easy to operate and damage free

Expert Tips:
To extend the life of your synthetic hair we recommend using BeautiMark care and styling products. BeautiMark is specially formulated for synthetic wigs and extensions.
If your hair is long enough to gather into a ponytail it's long enough to wear the 22" Pony Fall Extension.
Try reversing the pony for a shorter 18" pony.
When using heat tools on heat friendly synthetic, never go above the manufacturers recommended heat settings.
Once the Pony Fall has been styled with heat tools it will not return to its original shape without additional styling.

Title: WOW  Heat Friendly Synthetic  WOW BANGS
Body (HTML):
Color Shown (bottom left):RD12R
Type:Synthetic Clip In Bangs
Collection:WOW by LuxHair
Approx. Length:Front 7.5"

DESCRIPTION

WOW bangs by WOW offer you a way to instantly transform your look by adding bangs to any hairstyle. The heat friendly synthetic fiber offers styling options and looks, moves, and feels like real hair. The bangs attach with pressure sensitive clips which are easy to operate, lightweight and cause no damage. Skip the commitment of permanent bangs and clip them in instead! * Color choices that begin with "RD" indicate a rooted color. Rooted colors are designed to be darker at the root for the appearance of natural new growth.

Special Features:
Heat Friendly Synthetic fiber- looks, moves, and feels like real hair. Offers styling options.
Pressure sensitive clips- damage free, easy to operate and lightweight.

Expert Tips:
To extend the life of your synthetic bangs we recommend using BeautiMark care and styling products. BeautiMark is specially formulated for synthetic wigs and extensions
WOW bangs can be custom cut by your stylist to blend into your hairstyle or create a custom bang
WOW bangs work for all face shapes and hair lengths.

Title: Jamaican Black Castor Oil EXTRA DARK 8oz by SUNNY ISLE
Body (HTML):
Our Extra Dark Oil, as the name implies, has the most Ash Content.

It is thick and rich and is the most effective Oil for all your Hair and Skin conditions. Sunny Isle Extra Dark Jamaican Black Castor Oil is processed the traditional way. Our Organic seeds are roasted and ground by a manual Grinder and then the crushed beans are boiled to extract the 100% pure, dark brown, organic oil. It's the best quality oil on the market. Why you may ask? Compared to other brands it is the darkest Jamaican Black Castor Oil because we roast our beans longer which produces more Ash Content in our oil than any other oil on the market. More ash content increases the effectiveness of the oil. Therefore the Sunny Isle brand will strengthen and increase the length of your hair faster than any other brands on the market today.

Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor is the ONLY Jamaican Black Castor Oil that comes in a safety sealed bottle for your protection.

How To Use Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor oil for Hair Growth And As A Moisturizer?

Apply small amounts of Sunny Isle Jamaican Black high quality castor oil daily to the roots and scalp of your hair.

Then massage the oil into your scalp using your fingertips. You leave the oil on your scalp overnight. The oil will not soil your pillow as the Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil is easily absorbed.

Once per week use Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil as a Hot Oil Treatment preferably on the weekends by using generous amounts of Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil and really massage oil in scalp and hair.

After applying Jamaican Black Castor Oil to your scalp and hair, cover your hair with a plastic cap and go under the Dryer for 15 to 30 minutes.

After Hot Oil Treatment Shampoo out Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil preferable with a natural Shampoo and Conditioner. You may want to use Sunny Isle All Natural Lavender Jamaican Black Castor Shampoo and Conditioner.

You may now style and groom your hair on a daily basis with any one of Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil all Natural Hair Pomades lightly scented with your choice of fragrance, Lavender, Rosemary or Ylang Ylang essential oils. You will see results in two weeks after date of usage.

Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil for Eyelash and Eyebrow Growth Sunny isle Jamaican Black castor oil will help your Eyelashes and Eyebrows to grow thicker and longer, and keep them from breaking. It also helps you grow new eyebrow hair in bare areas that might have been over-tweezed. Massaging a little Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil over the base of your eyelashes before bed prevents thinning and promotes rapid growth, leading to thicker and fuller longer lashes. Do not use Sunny Isle scented Oils on your eyelashes such as the Lavender Jamaican Black Castor Oil, Ylang Ylang Jamaican Black Castor Oil and Rosemary Jamaican Black Castor Oil because the Essentials Oils we use in these product (Lavender, Rosemary, Ylang Ylang) may irritate your eyes. Only use the unscented Jamaican Black Castor Oil such as the Sunny Isle Extra Dark Jamaican Black Castor Oil and the Sunny Isle Regular Jamaican Black Castor Oil on your eyelashes. How to Use Sunny isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil for Eyebrow and Eyelash Hair Growth Wash your face with a mild soap preferably Sunny Isle Jamaican Black castor oil Soap and remove all traces of makeup from your eyelashes and eyebrows soap and remove all traces of makeup and dirt. Dip the mascara wand or a Qtip into Sunny Isle Jamaican black Castor oil, tapping off any excess oil. It is important to only apply a thin layer, so use a clean tissue to dab away drips from the wand/Qtip if necessary. Brush the oil evenly through your eyebrows from inner to out tip. Then use the wand/Qtip to apply the Sunny isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil to your eyelashes, just as you would mascara, from root to tip. Leave the Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil on overnight and rinse off with a mild soap, Sunny Isle Jamaican Black castor oil soap, in the morning before you apply your makeup/ moisturizer. Treating Acne Using Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil Many people are unaware that Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil has been used in many acne treatments. Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil treats many kinds of skin problems without drying the skin. Many of the acne treatments bought in store dry out the skin a great deal, as this is a method of slowing down the skins production of sebum. While sebum has been linked to acne, drying out the skin actually leads to even more sebum being produced in the future, which forced the skin to become dependent on the treatment in order to stay clear. Sunny Isle Jamaican Black castor oil treatment, however, is able to prevent the skin from drying out, while still reducing the production of sebum. How to use Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil to Treat Acne Start by putting a large pot of water on the stove and bringing it to a boil. Once the water is rapidly boiling, take it from the stove and put it on the counter. Make sure that it is in a very sturdy location and that nothing will fall on it. Put a towel over the back of your head, covering both head and face, and allow the steam from the water to hit your face. This will open up your pores and will allow the Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil to become a much more effective acne treatment. Once this has been completed, rub your face with a washcloth to remove any excess dirt and put a small amount of the Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor oil onto the cloth. Any one of our Jamaican Black Castor Oils may be used, but we recommend the use of our Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil with Ylang Ylang.It has a fabulous stimulating effect on the skin. The Ylang Ylang Essential oil helps to correct the production of sebum (Oil) in the body. Rub this oil all over your face using circular motions and make sure that you get any areas that are giving you trouble. If any areas of your skin are giving you particular problems, make sure that you apply a little bit extra Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor oil, especially the one with Ylang Ylang, in order to ensure that you have properly taken care of the area. Once the Sunny isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil is all over your face, keep it on for a few minutes so it can be absorbed into the skin then wash your face with warm water and make sure that all of the oil has been removed from your face. Splash your face with cold water, as this will allow your pores to close up. This is essential for the next step of the Sunny isle Jamaican Black Castor oil Acne Treatment, as you will not want your pores to remain open all night, since they will clog. Once you have washed your face with cold water, dry it off. Apply more Sunny Isle Jamaican Black Castor Oil {Recommended Ylang Ylang} acne treatment on your face and let it sit there overnight. Make sure that you put a bit of extra Sunny Isle Jamaican Black castor Oil on any areas that are causing you particular problems. When you wake up, wash your face with a moisturizing soap preferable Sunny Isle Lavender Jamaican Black Castor Oil Moisturizing Soap to prevent the drying of skin.

Title: Jamaican Castor Oil YLANG YLANG 8oz by SUNNY ISLE
Body (HTML): Ylang Ylang oil offers numerous health benefits, which explains the reason why it is so popular. In aromatherapy, Ylang Ylang evokes feelings of deep calm that melt away anxiety, tension and stress. It has a fabulous stimulating effect on the skin. Ylang Ylang oil helps to correct the production of sebum (Oil) in the body and is also of great value in hair care. Title: Jamaican Castor Oil EXTRA VIRGIN COCONUT OIL 2oz by SUNNY ISLE
Body (HTML): Sunny Isle Jamaican Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is extracted from the meat of the Coconut the old fashioned Jamaican way. Sunny Isle Jamaican Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is one of the best natural nutrition for hair. Our Oil is clear to light yellow in color and it may solidify in colder temperatures. Simply place bottle in warm tap water. Sunny Isle Jamaican Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil helps in healthy hair growth while providing your hair with a shiny look. Regular massage of the scalp with Sunny Isle Jamaican Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil ensures that your scalp is dandruff free.Our Sunny Isle Jamaican Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is an excellent conditioner and helps in the re-growth of damaged hair. Our Organic Coconut oil is an excellent massage oil for the skin as well. It acts as an effective moisturizer on all types of skins including dry skin. Sunny Isle Jamaican Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil delays wrinkles and the sagging of skin which normally become prominent with age. Our Organic Coconut oil also helps in treating various skin problems including psoriasis, dermatitis, eczema and other skin infections.

Title: Jamaican Black Castor Oil LAVENDER 8oz by SUNNY ISLE
Body (HTML): Lavender oil is the most known scent throughout the aromatic world, and regarded as the most versatile essence in aromatherapy. It has a sweet, balsamic, floral aroma which combines well with many oils including Jamaican Black Castor Oil. Lavender is a natural antibiotic, antiseptic, anti-depressant, sedative and de-toxifier. It works well on dry or acne prone skin. People who have alopecia can also use lavender, to treat their hair loss. So, for those of you that have dry acne prone skin, Alopecia, and or want their hair to grow fast then the combination of pure Lavender Essential Oil and Jamaican Black Castor Oil will get the job done.

Title: ULTRA SAFE Adhesive Remover For Scalp
Body (HTML): Ultra SafeProfessional Hair Labs Ultra-Safe is a one of a kind formulation designed to protect and soothe the scalp while removing the bonding adhesive. Ultra-Safe is an all natural, bio-degradable adhesive remover for use on the scalp only. It is designed not to affect the PH balance of the scalp, unlike all citrus and alcohol removers on the market today. One of the most common problems causing clients not to get the bond they are looking for is due to triggering the scalps sebaceous while cleaning and prepping. This causes excess oils to penetrate your newly applied adhesive and not have a chance to fully cure. Use Ultra-Safe once and you are guaranteed to see the difference!Organic Bio-Degradable Adhesive Remover for the scalpDesigned to retain PH Level of the ScalpDoes not interfere with the heads sebaceous glandsExtremely gentle and effective on the skin* Come with spray top

Title: GHOSTBUSTER Adhesive Remover
Body (HTML): GhostBusterProfessional Hair Labs Ghost Buster is fast acting citrus adhesive remover designed to clean hair systems only. Ghost Buster is highly refined and does not contain aloe or lanolin which has been proven to leave heavy oil residue on hair systems. Ghost Buster also does not affect the texture or color of the hair unit. If you are after a top quality adhesive remover, Ghost Buster is the product for you!For use on hair sytem only For scalp area use Ultra-Safe Will not harm hair unit or affect hair color Does not contain Aloe or Lanolin * Come with spray top

With new & improved features which include, extra moisture protection and higher melting point, you can have peace of mind and confidence that your bonding adhesive will hold up to the most intense climates. Formulated under the auspices of a team of chemists who develop surgical adhesives. Professional Hair Labs always puts safety first. GhostBond contains no latex, no harsh solvents or any of the irritants frequently found in cheaper formulations. It has been specially formatted for oily scalps, high humidity, and heavy perspiration.

Title: NOW Lace Front Wig By LUXHAIR CASUAL CURL 1101
Body (HTML):
Beautiful and mid-length style with open curls and detailed textured layers offers sensational volume with subtle movement

CASUAL CURL LACE FRONT

  • Wig Type: Lace Front
  • Dimensions :
    Fringe: 9.5 (24cm)
    Crown: 12 (30.5cm)
    Nape: 14 (36cm)

FIBER

Treated with LUXHAIR Keralon Plus, our exclusive Keratin coating that leaves hair soft, silky and beautiful.

NOW - Wigs

HOW TO DIRECTIONS:

1. Braid your hair and pin it up away from front, sides and nape of your head. A wig cap liner will help to keep in place.

2. Cut off excess lace in the front of the wig. BE VERY CAREFUL NOT TO CUT THE HAIR.

3. Place the wig on your head and position at hairline.

4. For a customized comfort fit use the adjustable hook tabs at the back of your wig.

Tuck in any stray hairs. Style as desired.

STYLING TOOLS SHOULD NOT EXCEED 320F.

Title: Saga Gold Remy Yaky Straight 16", 18"
Body (HTML):
Saga Gold Remy Human Hair YAKY Weave

Saga Gold YAKY Remy Human Hair Weave. Only young, healthy human hair is handpicked and aligned unidirectionally. Undirectional Alignment allows for elimination of all harsh chemical treatments that typically cause tangles and breakage; hair remains thicker, stronger and healthier. It is the smoothest, bounciest, and most lustrous hair in the market.

Whereas SAGA has all hairs of the same lenght so that it is full to the end, SAGA GOLD has combination of different lenghts of hairs so that it gives a layered look. And since it is not full to the end, it is alsomore affordable.

Cuticle Alignment

Curticle Alignment eliminates all harsh chemical treatments that typically cause tangles and breakage. By eliminating harsh chemical treatments the hair remains thicker, stronger and healthier. This is how we mke MILKYWAY SAGA so smooth, bouncy, maintenance-free, tangle-free, naturally lustrous, long lasting and easy to curl.

Maintenance

The specific weave or braid procedure work determine actual hair maintenance requirements. Ask you hair stylist for specific washing and maintence instructions.
Detangle hair from ends to roots before washing Carefully wash with lukewarm water and mild shampoo Do not rub or twist the hair/ Follow with conditioner Gently Squeeze out excess water and pat dry with towel. Do not roll or rub the hair dry into the towel. Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist. For bonded hair, do not blow dry or apply heat over adhesives.

Title: CLASSY Signature 100% Virgin Malaysian Remy Hair Weave - SPANISH WAVE
Body (HTML):
Length: 10"-12", 12"-14", 14"-16", 18"-20", 22"-24"

Shown Color: n/a

Fiber Type:100% Virgin Remi Human Hair

Available Colors: 1, 1B, 2, 3, 4, Natural Virgin Color




LUXURIOUS HAIR, ESSENTIAL BEAUTY.

Contains 100% Virgin Malaysian Remy Human Hair.
No Chemical Process.
Hand Cared.

CLASSY Signature Remy Hair is produced and handled with upmost care. To prevent tangling and matting, CLASSY Signature cuticles are kept in their natural orientation (root end first) throughout the preparation.

Unlike most human hair products in the market, our unique procedure keeps the hair from excessive chemical or machine manufacturing process.

CLASSY Signature, virgin REMY human hair, maintains its luxurious luster longer than other hair products; because our REMY hair carries their natural protective layer.

Our hygienic facilities are kept to highest industry ethical standards, with no labor exploitation.


CARE...

Always consult with professional hair stylist for best results.

Gently untangle hair in natural direction before washing.
Use lukewarm water (70'F), shampoo, follow with conditioner, rinse thoroughly.
Do not chafe or wring the hair.
Gently pat with dry towel to remove excess water.
Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist.

LUXURIOUS HAIR, ESSENTIAL BEAUTY.

Contains 100% Virgin Brazilian Remy Human Hair.
No Chemical Process.
Hand Cared.

CLASSY Signature Remy Hair is produced and handled with upmost care. To prevent tangling and matting, CLASSY Signature cuticles are kept in their natural orientation (root end first) throughout the preparation.

Unlike most human hair products in the market, our unique procedure keeps the hair from excessive chemical or machine manufacturing process.

CLASSY Signature, virgin REMY human hair, maintains its luxurious luster longer than other hair products; because our REMY hair carries their natural protective layer.

Our hygienic facilities are kept to highest industry ethical standards, with no labor exploitation.


CARE...

Always consult with professional hair stylist for best results.

Gently untangle hair in natural direction before washing.
Use lukewarm water (70'F), shampoo, follow with conditioner, rinse thoroughly.
Do not chafe or wring the hair.
Gently pat with dry towel to remove excess water.
Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist.

Title: Saga Gold Remy Yaky Straight 10", 12", 14"
Body (HTML):
Saga Gold Remy Human Hair YAKY Weave

Saga GoldYAKY RemyHuman Hair Weave. Only young, healthy human hair is handpicked and aligned unidirectionally. Undirectional Alignment allows for elimination of all harsh chemical treatments that typically cause tangles and breakage; hair remains thicker, stronger and healthier. It is the smoothest, bounciest, and most lustrous hair in the market.

Whereas SAGA has all hairs of the same lenght so that it is full to the end, SAGA GOLD has combination of different lenghts of hairs so that it gives alayered look.And since it is not full to the end, it is alosmore affordable.

Cuticle Alignment

Curticle Alignment eliminates all harsh chemical treatments that typically cause tangles and breakage. By eliminating harsh chemical treatments the hair remains thicker, stronger and healthier. This is how we mke MILKYWAY SAGA so smooth, bouncy, maintenance-free, tangle-free, naturally lustrous, long lasting and easy to curl.

Maintenance

The specific weave or braid procedure work determine actual hair maintenance requirements. Ask you hair stylist for specific washing and maintence instructions.
Detangle hair from ends to roots before washing Carefully wash with lukewarm water and mild shampoo Do not rub or twist the hair/ Follow with conditioner Gently Squeeze out excess water and pat dry with towel. Do not roll or rub the hair dry into the towel. Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist. For bonded hair, do not blow dry or apply heat over adhesives.

Title: Natural Curl Remi Weave by Goddess Classic Remi
Body (HTML):
Sensationnel Goddess Classic Remi Natural Curl100% Human Hair

Remy quality in loose deep wave style. Soft, durable and tangle free. Just gorgeous.

Remy Hair is also popularly referred to as virgin hair. Remy Hair can be categorized in the premium segment, as far as quality of hair extensions are concerned. Remy Hair is bundled so that the roots of the hair are on one side and the tip of the hair on the opposite side. Since all the hairs are placed in the same direction, there is less chance of tangling and so making them more durable and long lasting.

GODDESS Remi 100% Human Hair - Gorgeous, top quality, 100% human hair, made by Sensationnel. These are available in a variety of colors, lengths and textures to suit every occasion.

Since the days of Ancient Greece, women have desired long, luxurious hair. Now, through Sensationnel's breakthrough processes, we can bring you the world's finest premium Remi human hair- Goddess

First, Sensationnel search supplies around the globe and only the most healthy and youthful hair is chosen. Then they make sure that all cuticles face the same direction for less tangling and matting, being tagged and maintained as "root end first" throughout the manufacturing process. Because of this unique procedure, Sensationnel hair does not go through extensive chemical processing to remove cuticles like most other human hair products. Sensationnel Remi hair , with its protective layer intact, remains strong and healthy, maintaining its luxurious sheen longer than ordinary human hair.

Maintenance

The specific weave or braid procedure work determine actual hair maintenance requirements. Ask you hair stylist for specific washing and maintence instructions.

- Detangle hair from ends to roots before washing

- Carefully wash with lukewarm water and mild shampoo Do not rub or twist the hair/ Follow with conditioner

- Gently Squeeze out excess water and pat dry with towel. Do not roll or rub the hair dry into the towel.

- Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist.

- For bonded hair, do not blow dry or apply heat over adhesives

- Carefully wash with lukewarm water and mild shampoo Do not rub or twist the hair/ Follow with conditioner

- Gently Squeeze out excess water and pat dry with towel. Do not roll or rub the hair dry into the towel.

- Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist.

- For bonded hair, do not blow dry or apply heat over adhesives

Title: Loose Deep Remy Weave (12") by Goddess Remi
Body (HTML):
Sensationnel GODDESS Remi Loose Deep Wvg 12" 100% Human Hair

Remy quality in loose deep wave style. Soft, durable and tangle free. Just gorgeous.

Remy Hair is also popularly referred to as virgin hair. Remy Hair can be categorized in the premium segment, as far as quality of hair extensions are concerned. Remy Hair is bundled so that the roots of the hair are on one side and the tip of the hair on the opposite side. Since all the hairs are placed in the same direction, there is less chance of tangling and so making them more durable and long lasting.

GODDESS Remi 100% Human Hair - Gorgeous, top quality, 100% human hair, made by Sensationnel. These are available in a variety of colors, lengths and textures to suit every occasion.

Since the days of Ancient Greece, women have desired long, luxurious hair. Now, through Sensationnel's breakthrough processes, we can bring you the world's finest premium Remi human hair- Goddess

First, Sensationnel search supplies around the globe and only the most healthy and youthful hair is chosen. Then they make sure that all cuticles face the same direction for less tangling and matting, being tagged and maintained as "root end first" throughout the manufacturing process. Because of this unique procedure, Sensationnel hair does not go through extensive chemical processing to remove cuticles like most other human hair products. Sensationnel Remi hair , with its protective layer intact, remains strong and healthy, maintaining its luxurious sheen longer than ordinary human hair.

Maintenance

The specific weave or braid procedure work determine actual hair maintenance requirements. Ask you hair stylist for specific washing and maintence instructions.

- Detangle hair from ends to roots before washing

- Carefully wash with lukewarm water and mild shampoo Do not rub or twist the hair/ Follow with conditioner

- Gently Squeeze out excess water and pat dry with towel. Do not roll or rub the hair dry into the towel.

- Dry and style hair as recommended by your hair stylist.

- For bonded hair, do not blow dry or apply heat over adhesives

Title: 100% HUMAN HAIR CLIP ON BY HOLLYWOOD
Body (HTML):
Hollywood 100% Human Hair Extension - Clip-On 7 14" (7 pcs)

3 inch weft (5 pcs) + 6 inch weft (1 pc) + 9 inch weft (1 pc)

Comfort & Soft Clip.

Washing Instruction

1. Remove the clip-on hairpieces from your hair.

2. Wash the clip-on hairpieces in cool or lukewarm water.

3. Use Shampoo and brush gently.

4. Follow with conditioner and rinse thoroughly. Apply cream reins or wet-look spray as desired.

5. Pat dry and while using a wide -tooth comb, apply spray throughout.

6. Set and dry naturally.

7. Comb into desired style after hair is completely dry.

Title: 100% HUMAN REMY HAIR CLIP ON BY HOLLYWOOD
Body (HTML):
Hollywood 100% Human Remy Hair Extension - Clip-On 7 REMY(7 pcs)

3 inch weft (5 pcs) + 6 inch weft (1 pc) + 9 inch weft (1 pc)

Comfort & Soft Clip.

Washing Instruction

1. Remove the clip-on hairpieces from your hair.

2. Wash the clip-on hairpieces in cool or lukewarm water.

3. Use Shampoo and brush gently.

4. Follow with conditioner and rinse thoroughly. Apply cream reins or wet-look spray as desired.

5. Pat dry and while using a wide -tooth comb, apply spray throughout.

6. Set and dry naturally.

7. Comb into desired style after hair is completely dry.

Title: Exclusive Powder C: Serum+Powder
Body (HTML):
A blooming and lighter complexion in 6 weeks thanks to this vitamin-enriched concentrate

Thanks to its hermetic encapsulation system, the anti-pigmentary and anti-radical properties of Vitamin C are perfectly preserved, the treatment is overactive.

The combination "clearing serum + powder" creates a powerful formula actively fighting against spots, and leads to spectacular results. Your complexion is lighter, spots tend to disappear, your skin is radiant.

  • Content : 6 x 8 ml / 6 x 0.27 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: To be used as an intensive 6-week treatment (one 8-ml bottle per week).

To be used in the morning and/or in the evening on a perfectly clean skin. Based on in-depth research the EXCLUSIVE Vitamin C cares aim at sublimating all women. The properties of the EXCLUSIVE products are combined with Vitamin C in order to boost their lightening action. Vitamin C helps to fight against radicals and pigmentary blemishes: darker spots fade away and your skin is lighter.

Title: Dark Spot Remover
Body (HTML):
A targeted action, for a harmonious complexion

Forget all brown spots, thanks to this user-friendly and precise spray that acts directly on the zones targeted Its highly efficient formula progressively erases brown and unsightly marks. Your body recovers all his splendor.

  • Content : 30 ml / 1 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: On the cleansed skin, apply the Dark Spot Remover on the areas to be treated. Designed for black, mat and cross skins, the FAIR & WHITE Original products are part of your daily hygiene for a radiant complexion.

Dark skins require particular attention because various factors can lead to an erratic melanin production (the pigments that colour your skin). The active ingredients in the FAIR&WHITE Original products directly act on the melanocytes responsible for melanin production, and therefore help to combat dark spots and hyper-pigmentation.

Title: 100% HUMAN HAIR CLIP ON BY HOLLYWOOD
Body (HTML):
Hollywood 100% Human Hair Extension - Clip-On 7 14" (7 pcs)

3 inch weft (5 pcs) + 6 inch weft (1 pc) + 9 inch weft (1 pc)

Comfort & Soft Clip.

Washing Instruction

1. Remove the clip-on hairpieces from your hair.

2. Wash the clip-on hairpieces in cool or lukewarm water.

3. Use Shampoo and brush gently.

4. Follow with conditioner and rinse thoroughly. Apply cream reins or wet-look spray as desired.

5. Pat dry and while using a wide -tooth comb, apply spray throughout.

6. Set and dry naturally.

7. Comb into desired style after hair is completely dry.

Title: Exclusive Powder C: Serum+Powder
Body (HTML):
A blooming and lighter complexion in 6 weeks thanks to this vitamin-enriched concentrate

Thanks to its hermetic encapsulation system, the anti-pigmentary and anti-radical properties of Vitamin C are perfectly preserved, the treatment is overactive.

The combination "clearing serum + powder" creates a powerful formula actively fighting against spots, and leads to spectacular results. Your complexion is lighter, spots tend to disappear, your skin is radiant.

  • Content : 6 x 8 ml / 6 x 0.27 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: To be used as an intensive 6-week treatment (one 8-ml bottle per week).

To be used in the morning and/or in the evening on a perfectly clean skin. Based on in-depth research the EXCLUSIVE Vitamin C cares aim at sublimating all women. The properties of the EXCLUSIVE products are combined with Vitamin C in order to boost their lightening action. Vitamin C helps to fight against radicals and pigmentary blemishes: darker spots fade away and your skin is lighter.

Title: Dark Spot Remover
Body (HTML):
A targeted action, for a harmonious complexion

Forget all brown spots, thanks to this user-friendly and precise spray that acts directly on the zones targeted Its highly efficient formula progressively erases brown and unsightly marks. Your body recovers all his splendor.

  • Content : 30 ml / 1 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: On the cleansed skin, apply the Dark Spot Remover on the areas to be treated. Designed for black, mat and cross skins, the FAIR & WHITE Original products are part of your daily hygiene for a radiant complexion.

Dark skins require particular attention because various factors can lead to an erratic melanin production (the pigments that colour your skin). The active ingredients in the FAIR&WHITE Original products directly act on the melanocytes responsible for melanin production, and therefore help to combat dark spots and hyper-pigmentation.

Title: Dermapure Purifying Lotion
Body (HTML):
Ideal product for a purified and clearer skin

The antiseptic DERMAPURE lotion resolves effectively the problems of oily skins prone to acne.

Thanks to its antiacne and antibacterial agents well-known for their antiseptic and exfoliating properties, DERMAPURE Lotion fights against pimples and black-heads, and regulates excessive sebum. Y

our skin is visibly purified. Its soothing and softening agents also bring your skin a feeling of immediate comfort and coolness.

  • Content : 300 ml / 10.56 fl.oz
  • Category : Purifying Lotion
  • Skin type : Mixed to greasy skins

How to use: Daily apply on a perfectly cleansed skin. Designed for black, mat and cross skins, the FAIR & WHITE Original products are part of your daily hygiene for a radiant complexion.

Dark skins require particular attention because various factors can lead to an erratic melanin production (the pigments that colour your skin). The active ingredients in the FAIR & WHITE Original products directly act on the melanocytes responsible for melanin production, and therefore help to combat dark spots and hyper-pigmentation. YOUR ASSURANCE OF QUALITY

Title: Lightening Glycerin
Body (HTML):
A moisturized and glowing complexion in a single one gesture

The FAIR & WHITE Lightening Glycerin provides a dual moisturizing* and depigmenting action. Its moistening ingredients (72%) soften your epidermis, and its lightening component softly lightens your complexion. Your complexion is visibly clearer and radiant. * Upper layers of the epidermis

  • Content : 125 ml / 4.22 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: Daily apply on a perfectly cleansed skin. Designed for black, mat and cross skins, the FAIR & WHITE Original products are part of your daily hygiene for a radiant complexion.

Dark skins require particular attention because various factors can lead to an erratic melanin production (the pigments that colour your skin). The active ingredients in the FAIR & WHITE Original products directly act on the melanocytes responsible for melanin production, and therefore help to combat dark spots and hyper-pigmentation.

Title: Exclusive Cream Gel
Body (HTML):
A clearer skin from the first week !

Discover the advanced formula of the F&W EXCLUSIVE Cream-gel. Its new complex offers an ultra-effective whitening system. Your skin is smoother, clearer and beautifully radiant.

  • Content : 30 ml / 1 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: On the cleansed skin, apply the cream gel on the areas to be treated. Gently massage to make it penetrate. Daily use morning and evening during 3 or 6 weeks at least.

Based on in-depth research they aim at sublimating all women. Their active ingredients help to lighten and to durably target an even complexion. They prevent pigmentary blemishes by inhibiting melanin production: darker spots fade away and your skin is lighter.

Title: Intense Whitening Cream Gel
Body (HTML):
The solution for a clearer skin in a few weeks

The FAIR & WHITE Cream Gel helps to solve pigmentary problems thanks to its very effective lightening ingredients.

  • Content : 30 ml / 1 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: On the cleansed skin, apply the cream gel on the areas to be treated. Gently massage to make it penetrate. Daily use morning and evening during 3 or 6 weeks at least.

Designed for black, mat and cross skins, the FAIR & WHITE Original products are part of your daily hygiene for a radiant complexion.

Dark skins require particular attention because various factors can lead to an erratic melanin production (the pigments that colour your skin). The active ingredients in the FAIR & WHITE Original products directly act on the melanocytes responsible for melanin production, and therefore help to combat dark spots and hyper-pigmentation.

Title: Exclusive Vitamin C Silky Gel
Body (HTML):
A 0-default complexion

This unique cream gel associates a clarifying agent and Vitamin C providing skin smoothing; it therefore helps to slow down the metabolism of pigmentary cells: your skin is unified, radiant and free of imperfections. Its velvety texture gently melts on your skin and gives it a wonderful silky touch.

  • Content : 30 ml / 1 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: Apply a few drops in the morning and the evening on a clean face. Massage gently. Based on in-depth research the EXCLUSIVE Vitamin C cares aim at sublimating all women. The properties of the EXCLUSIVE products are combined with Vitamin C in order to boost their lightening action. Vitamin C helps to fight against radicals and pigmentary blemishes: darker spots fade away and your skin is lighter.

Title: Exclusive Clarifiance Fade Cream
Body (HTML):
The beauty secret for a purified and luminous skin

Clarifiance is a comprehensive care product that has been specially designed to almost eradicate the brown spots on your skin, while purifying and enhancing your complexion.

Its whitening ingredient inhibits the production of melanin, and prevents any reappearance of brown spots. Its antibacterial ingredient regulates the sebaceous secretions, slows down the development of new bacteria and purifies your skin. Thanks to the combination of the two active ingredients of Clarifiance, your skin is purified, clearer and more radiant.

  • Content : 200 ml / 6.76 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening and purifying care
  • Skin type : All skin Types

How to use: "To be used daily during 4 to 6 weeks; apply in the morning and in the evening where needed." Based on in-depth research they aim at sublimating all women. Their active ingredients help to lighten and to durably target an even complexion.

They prevent pigmentary blemishes by inhibiting melanin production: darker spots fade away and your skin is lighter.

Title: Lightening Cream with AHA & Vegetal Extracts
Body (HTML):
The FAIR & WHITE lightening formula, hydroquinone free, combines de-pigmenting plant-based ingredients with the exfoliating efficiency of fruit acids. Not only does it lighten your skin, it also revitalizes and makes it smooth with a beautiful radiance.

  • Content : 30 ml / 1 fl.oz
  • Category : Lightening care
  • Skin type : All skin types

How to use: To be used daily and/or nightly on perfectly cleansed skin. One of the priorities of our laboratories is to increase the efficacy of the FAIR & WHITE products: the regenerating and micro-exfoliating properties of the AHA visibly optimize the efficacy of our care products for black, mat and cross skins. Dark skins require particular attention because various factors can lead to an erratic melanin production (the pigments that colour your skin). The FAIR & WHITE Original AHA products improve the penetration ratio of the active ingredients and therefore help to combat dark spots and hyper-pigmentation.
